notes.title: Authorsâ€™ contributions
notes.p: PW, XJ, GC, DC, and LH contributed to the design of the study. CS, PW, WD contributed to sample collection. CS, DC, XJ, and PW contributed to the supervision. YS, SW, JL, LL, CC, ZL, JJ contributed to multi-omics analysis. All authors contributed to the data acquisition, analysis, or interpretation. PW, CS, YS, DC, XJ, ZL, and PW wrote the manuscript. All authors read and approved the final vision before submission.
